style: British humor with a whimsical, immersive, and engaging atmosphere; focus on absurd situations, ironic twists and double entendre; consistency in the theme of sci-fi adventure in a derelict space vessel.

Bridge.overview: The control center of the spacecraft, filled with outdated and blinking machinery

MessHall.overview: A mysterious hut decorated with oddly unsettling art and chockful of pungent curry containers

Airlock.overview: An instrument-riddled chamber regarded as the spacecraft's exit and entrance port; some scratches hint previous disturbances

BubbleBath.overview: A baffling amalgamation of spaceship materials encasing an antique bubble bath tub and vintage alien trinkets

Engineering.overview: The room responsible for the mechanically responsive spaceship that vitalizes with bizarre maroon piping and untrustworthy grinding wheels

SmippGorble.name: Smipp Gorble
SmippGorble.overview: A nerdy, enthusiastic 3-eyed alien who claims to be a spacential pharmacist who joined the invasion to peddle various illicit medications, and speaks with a lisp

CurryWizard.name: Curry Wizard
CurryWizard.overview: An eccentric, janitor named Jim possessed by an ancient and powerful Indian spice spirit, causing him to be a skilled master of delicious curry magic

CurryPotion.name: Curry Potion
CurryPotion.overview: A retro alien-designed glass bottle with a sublime scent, best made by the Curry Wizard; it chases away hungry hostility and calms irritated stomach aliens

SpaceKeyCode.name: Space Safe Key Code
SpaceKeyCode.overview: Peculiar numeric sequences potentially providing information on space warfare and safe keep on non-violent occasions of negotiation; convenient portal lock

CurryCure.name: The Quest for the Curry Cure
CurryCure.overview: Earn the trust of Smipp Gorble, secure ambiguous Curry Potion from Curry Wizard, unleash the gastronomeronomy elixir, fight blood-acquainted aliens, save the ship

ReleaseLock.name: Release the Spaceship Lock
ReleaseLock.overview: Discover Space KeyCode, Decode numerical arrangement, override counteroffensive machines, unlock engineer-inclined spaceship without falling prey primarily to a horde of famished invading rama-plunas
